overview:
Back Ground Information: There are many qualities and skills that go into being and excelent real estate professional-integrity, in debt community and market knowledge, marketing savy, effective negotiation skills and high-quality professional network, all of which are hallmarks of how I work

That said, in my experience as a Bozeman Mt Real estate professional, Ive found that providing the very best service is essentially about putting my clients first. This means keeping myself accessible, being a good listener as well as a good comunicator, and responding quickly to your needs, and Im available 7 days a weeks.

This “Client First ” philosphy has always been my approach and it requires me to continually improve my skills and ways of doing business. In addition, I’ve found that the latest technologies are enabling me to do everything I’ve always done, only much more quickly and efficently. They’ve slao helped me extend the range of services I provide to my clients.

I take pride in how I work with my out of State Clients.

Interest’s: Montana Special Olympics, Eagle Mount,Heart of The Valley, Proud Father of a Special Needs child ( Christian). Cub Scouts/Boy Scouts/Basketball/Music with my son Nick. Escaping with my wife and two Boys to exotic locales and experiencing new sights and adventures.

Best tips you have for a new owner Homeowner:

Find the right realtor to represent you. The purchase or sale of a home or investment property is one of the most complex and significant financial events in peoples’ lives. People typically seek the help of realtors when buying or selling real estate because of the complexity and importance of this transaction. The right realtor can help you find a home, sell your home, make an offer on a home, help you find buyers, and assist you with paperwork. Make sure your Realtor has a thorough knowledge of the real estate market in their communities. They are familiar with local zoning and know where to obtain financing for the purchase of property. Other: ENTHUSIASIM IS MY MOST POWERFUL ENGINE TO REAL ESTATE, CALL DAVE FOR ALL YOUR REAL ESTATE NEEDS IN MONTANA AND THE REST OF THE COUNTRY
